Html:
There are some tutorial of how to use m:ui in an application made with caliburn.micro.

I try MaHapps.metro but requires .net 4.5 and iam limited to 4.0 so MUI seem the only chance.

I like the graphics very much (even more than mahapps) but merge mui navigation framework with caliburn.micro seem over my possibility
Check out this post on StackOverflow: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/16421582/caliburn-micro-and-modernui-examples-tutorials
